snippet: Landon Donovan, starting his second off-season loan in England in two years, made his first appearance for Everton on Wednesday.
abstract: Landon Donovan, starting his second off-season loan in England in two years, made his first appearance for Everton on Wednesday.
lead_paragraph: 3:35 p.m. | Updated Landon Donovan provided some wonderful highlights during his two-month, 13-game loan to Everton in 2010. Though credited with only two goals during his brief time with the Toffees, Donovan played extremely well: he injected speed on the wing, served up assists, took corner kicks and helped the squad earn victories over the likes of Manchester City, Manchester United and Chelsea. Named the club's player of the month for January, he made a lasting impression with fans, teammates and Everton Manager David Moyes.
